Gets weirder. Even stranger none of the police scanner codes I can find onl=
ine so far seem to follow along with thier callout codes for seven. Not sur=
e if its something new they implemented or what I will ask when I get a cha=
nce. The trooper I was talking to has been on the force quite a few years b=
ut I know they have been implementing some changes on how they do things ju=
st not sure if thats one of them.
=A0
Misty

--- On Mon, 5/11/09, Misty Daw=

To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, May 11, 2009, 2:28 AM













Yeah I had=
nt heard of it until today. I just looked at him and said glad hes alive an=
d thanks for the info I find the 7 thing interesting.
=A0
Ive had spirits s=
ay they were seven before when I asked what it was they always lead me to t=
he conclusion it was a label for the group speaking this info just made me =
go hmmm then wow once it sunk in. Interesting synchronicity anyway.
=A0
Mis=
ty

--- On Mon, 5/11/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


From: Z=
ack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>

ting tidbit of info
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday, May 11, 2009=

I guess police still use those codes. Emergency agencies suc=
h as ESDA now follow the FEMA Incident Command System/National Incident Man=
agement System=A0which requires all=A0communications to be in plain English=
 (no codes).

Zack

=A0
On Sun, May 10, 2009 at 11:31 PM, Misty Dawn <bulle=
tbabea@ yahoo.com> wrote:













Tonight at work I was talking to a s=
tate trooper, there had been an accident. I asked him if there were any dea=
ths (it was very very bad) and he said he didnt know so he got on his radio=
 and called in and asked them if it was a 7 at the site. They told him nega=
tive, and he told me the little boy who was the worst off was still alive. =
I asked him why did you ask them if it was a 7. He said code 7, I was askin=
g them if they were dead. So if you ever hear anyone call 7 over the radio =
that means someones dead.
=A0
Just thought I would pass that on. I find it =
interesting since I know alot of us have heard this before when used to des=
cribe who is speaking rather than a name they say seven.
=A0
Misty
